Genesis

11 December 2017

I consider myself very fortunate that I knew what I wanted to do in life when I was very young. All my life choices leading up to my career were moulded around a well defined goal - to build ships. However, despite all the practical exposure I had, I had very limited access to other educational resources, despite the boom of the internet in those years.
